page.title: 09SOWOOD
page.content: Sowood is approximately 1km south of {Stainland.}It is on the side of a hill and overlooks Jagger Green. There are a lot of things in Sowood which have lasted from a long time ago. There are two old fashioned lamp posts which were powered by gas, and a post box which is set into the wall with V.R. on it. Most of the houses are old and built of stone, and many of them have fancy chimney pots. Over the past few years quite a few new houses have been built, such as Mayfair Avenue and Greenfield Close. There is an old school which was built in 1879 and is now used as a community centre. The playgroup, baby club,dancing class and badminton group all meet at the centre. It is also used for galas, discos and fairs.
